      • open

        public void open​(javax.sound.sampled.Clip clip)
          throws javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Ope
        Parameters:
        clip - the clip to open
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the buffer size does not represent anintegral number of sample frames, or if format is notfully specified or invalid
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the line is already open
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if the line cannot be opened due toresource restrictions
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the line cannot be opened due to securityrestrictions
